sample.title: Simple template pattern
sample.description: This sample demonstrates the basic way to use templating in an HTML page.

sample.title: Advanced (JSON) template pattern
sample.description: This sample demonstrates the advanced way to use templating in an HTML page. This is specially useful when we want to access to XML attributes for instance.

sample.title: Delayed template pattern
sample.description: This sample demonstrates how to set an image tag source. Sometimes we have to use some HTML attributes but only at runtime, and not at design time. Especially in case of HTML templates used in iterations: the HTML nodes of the templates are present only for the CTF, but not for a GUI library such as JQuery mobile for instance.
